mapper.insert: INSERT INTO geo (location, altitude, altitude_ref, gps_speed, gps_speed_ref, img_info_id, created_by, created_time, updated_time) VALUES (ST_PointFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', #{longitude}, ' ', #{latitude}, ')')), #{altitude}, #{altitudeRef}, #{gpsSpeed}, #{gpsSpeedRef}, #{imgInfoId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE geo
location = ST_PointFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', #{longitude}, ' ', #{latitude}, ')')),
altitude = #{altitude},
altitude_ref = #{altitudeRef},
gps_speed = #{gpsSpeed},
gps_speed_ref = #{gpsSpeedRef},
img_info_id = #{imgInfoId},
updated_time = #{updatedTime}
WHERE geo_id = #{geoId}
mapper.select: SELECT geo_id, ST_X(location) AS longitude, ST_Y(location) AS latitude, altitude, altitude_ref, gps_speed, gps_speed_ref, img_info_id, created_by, created_time, updated_time FROM geo WHERE geo_id = #{id}
